trans-unit.source: Defines an object that knows how to invoke a command.
The command source defines how a command is invoked by that particular object.
trans-unit.target: L'origine del comando definisce come un comando viene richiamato da un particolare oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is associated with a command, the command is invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> è associata a un comando, il comando viene richiamato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> si fa clic.

trans-unit.source: A command source will normally disable itself if the command it is associated with cannot execute on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Un comando di origine verrà in genere disabilitata automaticamente se non è possibile eseguire il comando che è associato il comando sulla destinazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> command will gray itself out when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> command cannot execute on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> associato il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> comando verrà automaticamente visualizzati in grigio quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> comando non è possibile eseguire il comando sulla destinazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: Normally, a command source will listen to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event on the command.
trans-unit.target: In genere, un comando di origine resterà in ascolto il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> evento del comando.

trans-unit.source: This informs the command source when conditions change on the command target, such as loss of keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Questo indica l'origine del comando al variare delle condizioni nella destinazione di comando, ad esempio perdita di stato attivo della tastiera.

trans-unit.source: The command source can then query the command using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L'origine del comando può quindi eseguire una query il comando utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Some of the classes in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] that implement <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> are: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.
trans-unit.target: Alcune delle classi in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] che implementano <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> sono: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] commanding system, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> is only applicable when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Nel [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] dei comandi di sistema, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> proprietà in un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> è applicabile solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> and the corresponding command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> è impostata su un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> e il comando corrispondente non è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, la destinazione del comando viene ignorata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that will be executed when the command source is invoked.
The command that will be executed when the command source is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Comando che verrà eseguito quando viene richiamata l'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: Represents a user defined data value that can be passed to the command when it is executed.
The command specific data.
Normally, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A> is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: In genere, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A> viene utilizzata per passare informazioni specifiche per il comando quando viene eseguita.

trans-unit.source: The type of the data is defined by the command.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di dati è definito dal comando.

trans-unit.source: The object that the command is being executed on.
The object that the command is being executed on.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto su cui viene eseguito il comando.

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] commanding system, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> is only applicable when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Nel [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] dei comandi di sistema, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> proprietà in un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> è applicabile solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> and the corresponding command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> è impostata su un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> e il comando corrispondente non è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, la destinazione del comando viene ignorata.

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is the object on which the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, la destinazione del comando è l'oggetto in cui il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> vengono generati eventi.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> property is not set, the element with keyboard focus will be used as the target.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> non è impostata, l'elemento con stato attivo della tastiera da utilizzare come destinazione.
